==Trivia==
*In {{w|Shinto}}, {{w|shimenawa}} are ropes made of woven rice straw or hemp fiber used in ritual purifications, as they are believed to ward off evil spirits. Shimenawa are also placed around ''yorishiro'', objects that are believed to attract or contain {{Lang|{{w|kami}} (spirits)|ja={{Rubi|神|かみ}}}}.
*The Lore explains [[Asase Hibiki]]'s story while living at the [[Grand Narukami Shrine]], and her relationship with [[Kitsune Saiguu]] and [[Takamine the Mistsplitter]].
